    • ucigame.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for images in ucigame.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(int _x, int _y)
      Draws the image so that its upper left hand corner is at the specified position, relative to the upper left hand corner of the canvas.
      int height()
      This method return the height of the image.
      int width()
      This method return the width of the image.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(int _x,
        int _y)
        Draws the image so that its upper left hand corner is at the specified position, relative to the upper left hand corner of the canvas. Can only be called inside the game class's draw() method.
        Parameters:
        _x - the x value of drawing position
        _y - the y value of drawing position

      • width

        This method return the width of the image.

        the width of the image

        the height of the image
